pages.text: The Blast Furnace is a 3x3x4 brick structure, hollow in the middle, for converting Iron Ingots into Steel Ingots.$(br2)The Oven is built out of 34 special bricks made from Nether Brick, Soul Sand, and Magma Cream. If broken down, it takes 36 Nether Bricks, 36 Soul Sand, and 9 Magma Creams to build one Blast Furnace. Blast Furnaces cannot be built adjacent to each other â€“ there must be at least one tile in between Furnaces.
